name: Magical Key
description:
Small game created in Java.

Thanks to D3monPixel for some mob texutres!

Upgrade your spells!

Change spell with 'Q' or 'E'.

Play worlds with challanges. (WIP)

Use as mod api & create your own mods!
Don't forget to join my Discord server! https://discord.gg/VvDvnxU
